statements: SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, utility_type, utility_cost FROM buildings WHERE utility_usage > 100;
SELECT building_name, utility_type, utility_usage FROM buildings WHERE utility_cost < 500;
SELECT building_id, building_name, utility_type FROM buildings ORDER BY utility_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE utility_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM buildings ORDER BY utility_cost DESC, building_name ASC;
SELECT building_name, utility_type, utility_usage FROM buildings WHERE utility_cost >= 1000 AND utility_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT building_id, building_name, utility_type, utility_usage, utility_cost FROM buildings WHERE owner_id = 1 ORDER BY utility_cost ASC;
SELECT building_name, utility_type, SUM(utility_cost) AS total_cost FROM buildings GROUP BY utility_type, building_name;
SELECT DISTINCT utility_type, AVG(utility_cost) AS avg_cost FROM buildings GROUP BY utility_type;
SELECT * FROM Owners;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM Owners;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM Owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UtilityUsage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, utility_type, usage_value FROM Owners INNER JOIN UtilityUsage ON Owners.owner_id = UtilityUsage.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM Owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM Owners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM UtilityUsage WHERE usage_value > 1000 ORDER BY usage_value DESC;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(usage_id) AS total_usage FROM UtilityUsage GROUP BY owner_id HAVING total_usage > 5;

SELECT owner_name, utility_type, usage_value, usage_date FROM Owners o JOIN UtilityUsage u ON o.owner_id = u.owner_id WHERE o.owner_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob') AND u.usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE total_sq_ft > 5000;
SELECT owner_name, building_name FROM property_owners JOIN buildings ON property_owners.building_id = buildings.building_id;
SELECT DISTINCT utility_type FROM utility_usage;
SELECT * FROM utility_usage WHERE usage_amount > 1000;
SELECT owner_name, building_name, address FROM property_owners INNER JOIN buildings ON property_owners.building_id = buildings.building_id;
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE total_sq_ft > 5000 ORDER BY total_sq_ft DESC;
SELECT owner_name, utility_type, usage_date, usage_amount FROM property_owners INNER JOIN utility_usage ON property_owners.building_id = utility_usage.building_id ORDER BY usage_date;

SELECT owner_name, building_name, total_sq_ft, usage_amount FROM property_owners INNER JOIN buildings ON property_owners.building_id = buildings.building_id INNER JOIN utility_usage ON buildings.building_id = utility_usage.building_id;
SELECT DISTINCT utility_type FROM utility_usage;
SELECT * FROM building_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, building_address FROM building_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT * FROM utility_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electric' ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT reading_date, usage_kwh, cost_usd FROM utility_readings WHERE meter_id = 1001 AND usage_kwh > 100 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(usage_kwh) AS total_usage, SUM(cost_usd) AS total_cost FROM utility_readings GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT * FROM building_owners WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT building_address, owner_name FROM building_owners;
SELECT * FROM utility_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electricity' ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT reading_date, cost_usd FROM utility_readings WHERE usage_kwh > 1000 AND cost_usd > 50 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(cost_usd) AS total_cost FROM utility_readings GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, phone_number FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT utility_name, unit_of_measurement FROM Utilities WHERE utility_id = 3;
SELECT owner_name, billing_date, total_cost FROM PropertyOwners JOIN BillingRecords ON PropertyOwners.owner_id = BillingRecords.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, phone_number FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE address LIKE '123%';
SELECT utility_name, unit_of_measurement FROM Utilities WHERE utility_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT owner_name, billing_date, total_cost FROM PropertyOwners JOIN BillingRecords ON PropertyOwners.owner_id = BillingRecords.owner_id WHERE BillingRecords.total_cost > 1000;
